statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_quality_studies;
SELECT study_name, institution_name FROM healthcare_quality_studies;
SELECT study_id, study_name FROM healthcare_quality_studies WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_quality_studies WHERE institution_name = 'Hospital ABC';
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM healthcare_quality_studies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_quality_studies WHERE start_date >= '2020-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT study_name, institution_name FROM healthcare_quality_studies WHERE institution_name = 'Hospital A' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT study_id, institution_name, start_date FROM healthcare_quality_studies WHERE institution_name LIKE '%Research%' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT institution_name, COUNT(*) AS total_studies FROM healthcare_quality_studies GROUP BY institution_name HAVING total_studies > 3;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_quality_studies ORDER BY start_date ASC, study_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_institutions;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM healthcare_institutions;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_studies;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_institutions WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM healthcare_institutions WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT institution_name, location FROM healthcare_institutions WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_institutions WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_studies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT institution_name, location, study_name, start_date, end_date FROM healthcare_institutions JOIN research_studies ON healthcare_institutions.institution_id = research_studies.institution_id;

SELECT institution_name, location, COUNT(study_id) AS total_studies FROM healthcare_institutions LEFT JOIN research_studies ON healthcare_institutions.institution_id = research_studies.institution_id GROUP BY institution_name, location;
SELECT * FROM Institutions;
SELECT institution_name, institution_id FROM Institutions ORDER BY institution_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE institution_id = 3;
SELECT study_name, study_date FROM Studies WHERE researcher_id = 5 ORDER BY study_date ASC;
SELECT institution_name, COUNT(researcher_id) AS researcher_count FROM Institutions JOIN Researchers ON Institutions.institution_id = Researchers.institution_id GROUP BY institution_name;
SELECT * FROM Studies WHERE study_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT study_name, researcher_name FROM Studies INNER JOIN Researchers ON Studies.researcher_id = Researchers.researcher_id;
SELECT institution_name, COUNT(researcher_id) AS researcher_count FROM Institutions INNER JOIN Researchers ON Institutions.institution_id = Researchers.institution_id GROUP BY institution_name;

SELECT study_name, researcher_name, institution_name FROM Studies INNER JOIN Researchers ON Studies.researcher_id = Researchers.researcher_id INNER JOIN Institutions ON Researchers.institution_id = Institutions.institution_id ORDER BY study_name DESC;

SELECT institution_name, AVG(researcher_id) AS avg_researcher_id FROM Institutions INNER JOIN Researchers ON Institutions.institution_id = Researchers.institution_id GROUP BY institution_name HAVING avg_researcher_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_institutions;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM healthcare_institutions ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_studies WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM study_participants WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT result_id, result_data FROM study_results;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_institutions ORDER BY location DESC, institution_name ASC;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM healthcare_institutions WHERE location='New York';
SELECT participant_name, age FROM study_participants WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_studies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;

SELECT s.study_name, p.participant_name, r.result_data FROM research_studies s JOIN study_results r ON s.study_id = r.study_id JOIN study_participants p ON r.participant_id = p.participant_id WHERE s.start_date <= '2022-06-01' AND p.age < 50 ORDER BY p.age ASC, s.start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM institutions;
SELECT * FROM research_studies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers WHERE institution_id = 2;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_studies WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM institutions ORDER BY institution_id DESC, institution_name ASC
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers WHERE institution_id = 1 AND research_area = 'Biotechnology'
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_studies WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT record_date, data_content FROM data_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY record_date DESC
